text: Orhad "Ady" Barkan (December 18, 1983 - November 1, 2023) was an American lawyer and progressive activist. He was the co-founder of the Be a Hero PAC and is an organizer for the Center for Popular Democracy. Barkan became known when he told then-U.S. Senator Jeff Flake on a plane back in 2017 asking him to "be a hero" and vote no on the tax bill. Barkan was diagnosed with terminal ALS in 2016.
